Class Browser

java.lang.Object
  Browser

public class Browser
extends java.lang.Object

This class mimics a Browser of the website Wine Direct or A potential Buyer. There are two types of browsers those who have an ID and those who do not Inorder to become a buyer browser must be 18 years of age Details must also be submited for website to give random Id

Version:
(16-11-2016)
Author:
(Omotola Shogunle Group 2)

Constructor Summary
Browser()
          Constructor for browsers with an ID This browser has been allocated an iD therefore browser's buyer status is true.
Browser(java.lang.String mailAddress, int birthYear)
          Constructor for browsers who do not have an ID yet Details of new browsers should be entered in specified fields
 
Method Summary
 java.util.ArrayList getBasket()
          Returns the list of items in our Basket
 int getBirthYear()
          This method returns year of birth for buyer
 boolean getBuyerStatus()
          This method tells if the current browser is a buyer or a browser
 java.lang.String getEmail()
          Returns email address of buyer
 int getID()
          This method returns uniqueID of buyer
 Website getWebsite()
          Method returns address of website browser ir buyer is surfing This address gives information about the noOfhits and salesTotal of website
 WineCase getWineCase()
          Method returns address for wine case selected by buyer.
 void payForWine()
          Finally buyer can pay for wine This method is called at checkout in the Website class This method has a self referencing method to indicate what website browser is currently in
 void selectWineCase(WineCase wineCase1)
          Allows browsers purchase wine case provided that they are buyers Only one wineCase can be selected at a time when browser is login
 void setBuyerStatus(boolean newBuyer)
          This method is called whenever browsers login and have a unique iD to become buyers This changes their status to true else buyer status remains false
 void setID(int newID)
          sets buyers unique Id, this method is called by the website class Inorder to administer random ID to buyer
 void setWebsite(Website newWebsite)
          sets the website for which browser purchases wine from.
 void showBasket()
          This method reveals the details of whats in the basket of buyers

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
